metadata.title: CVE-2023-6478 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds memory read in RRChangeOutputProperty andRRChangeProviderProperty

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
